attributes.additional_details: THIS PETITION IS TO GET UK GOVERNMENT SUPPORT THE FIGHT AGAINST CORRUPTION BY LEADERS FROM AFRICA ESPECIALLY NIGERIA. THE IDEA IS TO BANNED ANY ELECTED OR APPOINTED OFFICER/EXECUTIVE FROM COMING INTO UK AND BARRED THEIR FAMILY'S FROM ENTERING UK IF THEIR FAMILY NAME IS INDICTED OR FACING ALLEGATION OF CORRUPTION WITH THE SMALLEST PROOF OF EVIDENCE ACCEPTABLE IN A PROPER COURT OF LAW OR WITHIN LEGAL FRAMEWORK ACCEPTABLE IN EUROPE AND UK.
